name: hub_payment_batch
description: This table represents a batch of payment transactions processed together, capturing detailed information about each transaction.

columns.name: sym_run_date
columns.description: The date when the batch of transactions was processed.

columns.name: tranx_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each transaction in the batch.

columns.name: tranx_type
columns.description: The type or category of the transaction.

columns.name: client_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the client associated with the transaction.

columns.name: mobile_no
columns.description: The mobile number linked to the transaction.

columns.name: from_acc
columns.description: The account from which the funds are debited.

columns.name: to_acc
columns.description: The account to which the funds are credited.

columns.name: provider_code
columns.description: Code representing the service provider handling the transaction.

columns.name: service_code
columns.description: Code representing the service type of the transaction.

columns.name: cus_code
columns.description: Unique code identifying the customer.

columns.name: amount
columns.description: The total amount of the transaction.

columns.name: tranx_note
columns.description: Additional notes or comments about the transaction.

columns.name: tranx_status
columns.description: The current status of the transaction (e.g., completed, pending).

columns.name: tranx_time
columns.description: The timestamp when the transaction was executed.

columns.name: res_code
columns.description: Code indicating the result of the transaction processing.

columns.name: device_id
columns.description: Identifier for the device used to perform the transaction.

columns.name: flat_fee
columns.description: A fixed fee charged for the transaction.

columns.name: fee_on_amt
columns.description: Fee calculated as a percentage of the transaction amount.

columns.name: real_amount
columns.description: The actual amount after fees and charges.

columns.name: ccy
columns.description: The currency in which the transaction is denominated.

columns.name: tranx_remark
columns.description: Additional remarks or comments about the transaction.

columns.name: product_type
columns.description: The type of product involved in the transaction.

columns.name: discount
columns.description: Any discount applied to the transaction.

columns.name: tranx_refno
columns.description: Reference number for the transaction.

columns.name: branch_code
columns.description: Code identifying the branch where the transaction was processed.

columns.name: service_type
columns.description: The type of service provided in the transaction.

columns.name: charge_to
columns.description: The account to which charges are applied.

columns.name: credit_name_en
columns.description: The name of the beneficiary in English.

columns.name: credit_name_vn
columns.description: The name of the beneficiary in Vietnamese.

columns.name: bene_bank_code
columns.description: Code of the bank where the beneficiary holds an account.

columns.name: cus_name
columns.description: Name of the customer involved in the transaction.

columns.name: remit_number
columns.description: Number associated with the remittance transaction.

columns.name: pay_channel
columns.description: The channel through which the payment was made.

columns.name: bill_id
columns.description: Identifier for the bill associated with the transaction.

columns.name: from_ccy
columns.description: The currency from which the transaction is converted.

columns.name: to_ccy
columns.description: The currency to which the transaction is converted.

columns.name: pos_code
columns.description: Code identifying the point of sale where the transaction occurred.

columns.name: bene_branch
columns.description: Branch of the bank where the beneficiary holds an account.

columns.name: bene_pos
columns.description: Point of sale associated with the beneficiary.

columns.name: charge_acc
columns.description: The account to which transaction charges are billed.

columns.name: exchange_rate
columns.description: The rate used to convert currencies in the transaction.

columns.name: metadata
columns.description: Additional data or information related to the transaction.

columns.name: trade_no
columns.description: Number associated with the trade or transaction.

columns.name: tranx_method
columns.description: The method used to perform the transaction.

columns.name: os
columns.description: Operating system of the device used for the transaction.

columns.name: year
columns.description: The year when the transaction occurred.

columns.name: month
columns.description: The month when the transaction occurred.

columns.name: day
columns.description: The day when the transaction occurred.

columns.name: transaction_code_domain
columns.description: Code representing the domain of the transaction.

columns.name: transaction_code_family
columns.description: Code representing the family category of the transaction.

columns.name: transaction_code_subfamily
columns.description: Code representing the subfamily category of the transaction.

columns.name: acceptor_name_t1
columns.description: Name of the merchant or acceptor of the transaction.

columns.name: bill_account
columns.description: Account number associated with the billing for the transaction.

columns.name: payment_channel
columns.description: The channel through which the payment was processed.

columns.name: request_id
columns.description: Identifier for the request associated with the transaction.

columns.name: rtf_posting_type
columns.description: Type of posting used in the transaction.

columns.name: raw_message
columns.description: Raw message data related to the transaction.
